src:
Liliana de ‘Casados’ maravilhada: “O Pedro proporcionou-me uma manhã inesquecível”
06 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Manuela Lopes

No episódio desta quarta-feira, Pedro surpreendeu Liliana ao proporcionar-lhe uma manhã diferente.

Na semana do ‘sim’, Pedro decidiu levar a esposa a passar uma manhã a andar a cavalo e o resultado foi muito bom para o casal. Liliana nunca havia experimentado andar a cavalo mas como já havia comentado com Pedro que gostava de experimentar, o concorrente atento, proporcionou-lhe.
“Andar a cavalo! Algo que eu nunca fiz!”, começou por dizer Liliana, acrescentando: “Ele teve a atitude mais sensata e muito bem conseguida. Ele proporcionou-me uma manhã inesquecível!”, terminou.

Parece que desta vez, o concorrente ganhou pontos com a esposa.
text:
Liliana from Married Marveling: “Pedro gave me an unforgettable morning”
06 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Manuela Lopes

In Wednesday's episode, Pedro surprised Liliana by giving her a different morning.

In the week of yes, Pedro decided to take his wife to spend a morning riding a horse and the result was very good for the couple. Liliana had never tried horseback riding but as she had already commented to Pedro that she liked to try, the attentive competitor provided it.
"Horseback riding! Something I've never done! ”Liliana began by adding,“ He had the most sensible and very successful attitude. He provided me with an unforgettable morning! ”He finished.
RELATED


Rita Pereira amazed after visiting the tallest building in the world


Diana Chaves marveling at twin nephews


Married at First Sight: Pedro and Liliana's First Passionate Kiss


Disappointed 'Married at First Sight' Liliana: 'When it's me, there's never anyone here'


It seems that this time, the competitor earned points with his wife.
